title.zh: 南昌：感恩母爱 温暖同行
title.en: Nanchang: Grateful for Maternal Love, Walking Together with Warmth

subtitle.zh: 2025年江西血友感恩母亲节特别活动
subtitle.en: 2025 Jiangxi Hemophilia Grateful Mother's Day Special Activity

description.zh: 南昌血之友公益协会开展「感恩母爱 温暖同行」——2025年江西血友感恩母亲节特别活动。这次活动特别关注血友病患者的母亲们，感谢她们在照顾血友病孩子过程中的无私奉献和坚强支撑，同时也关注那些本身就是血友病携带者的母亲们，为她们送去节日的温暖和关怀。
description.en: Nanchang Hemophilia Association conducted the 'Grateful for Maternal Love, Walking Together with Warmth' - 2025 Jiangxi Hemophilia Grateful Mother's Day Special Activity. This activity particularly focused on mothers of hemophilia patients, thanking them for their selfless dedication and strong support in caring for children with hemophilia, while also paying attention to mothers who are hemophilia carriers themselves, bringing them holiday warmth and care.

title.zh: 微信公众号：母亲节特别活动报道
title.en: WeChat: Mother's Day Special Activity Report
